SEARCH

Package utils

package utils
  • Class
    Description
    AnimationUtil
    The AnimationUtil class provides methods about animation.
    AudioUtil
    The GameAudioUtils class is the class that provide the MediaPlayer for audio and update volume method.
    DrawUtil
    The utility class that provide sprite drawing method and PixelReader for sprite.
    DrawUtil.ColortoHue
    Enum representing colors mapped to hue values.
    FontUtil
    The FontUtil class provides methods about font.
    GameConfig
    This class contains configuration settings for the game.
    MessageTextUtil
    The utility class used for generating text to be displayed in the MessagePane.
    RandomUtil
    The RandomUtil is the class that provide the random method and random the enemy list from pool.
    TextFileUtil
    The TextFileUtil class provides utility methods for reading text files.
    TransitionUtil
    The utility class that provide about initialize the Transition instance.
